channel.title: How did you think of your username/server name?
channel.description: How did you think of your username/server name? I got Umah from a random username generator :D lol. My first server was called True-Pkers, which I came up the name because I loved pking and my friends username was True. How about you guys?

item.title: How did you think of your username/server name?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

kingscape - someone else’s server that i re-did a long time ago.
javafire - i was drunk

Read full topic

actually i like that name/

item.title: How did you think of your username/server name?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

My name is actually, very self explanatory. I decided on it a long ass time ago when I bought dogs to hunt for some coon. Since then, my entire family has called me “The CoonHunter”. My mother actually had put that on my graduation card of all things as well -.-

No, I don’t actually hunt to kill the coon, I hunt them to get out at night.

Read full topic

item.title: How did you think of your username/server name?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

On my first server something like legeon-pkz or w/e (no longer runs…) i tried the name I Pure I but it didnt fucking work since i was intending to pk as a pure i tried, I Pk I, didnt fucking work so i just did
Pure = Pure
2 = to
Ownage = Ownage
so the breakdown together is “Pures are Ownage”; Then i realised instead of 2 i was supposed to put 4 to make it Pure for Ownage but i kept failing and said fuck it and kept this name.

before that i used my irl name which was retarded (included last name)

Read full topic
item.source: How did you think of your username/server name?

I got my mopar username from the first ever server I played back in the day… About 3years ago to be exact. When RS was actually good. The server was K03dPl0x.no-ip.biz (no longer runs), randomly one day I made the name Funyou, later got admin, and till this day use it occasionally on servers.

item.title: How did you think of your username/server name?

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Well first of all i have alot of names to choose from. Theres

Nick
Nick is here
F4t4l 3rr0r
fatal error
R3 cr3 8 3d - (recreated if u cant read it)
Fire of zion
Std santa

nick and nick is here were the names just based of my name…
the middle 3 where rs players i knew

and the last one is jst funny

EDIT: and for my server name, i used to code for a server named life-zero. i hated the hoster so i just made my own and named it life-x.
